item.title: A Scene Needs Legible Problems
item.description: Writing up the notes for UNIX one things occurs to me and that is how important it is for a scene to have clear stuff to work on. Someone joining the scene should be able to spend a little while wandering around, talking to people, and tinkering in order to come up with a research direction1.
